text:
ITZY (있지) is a South Korean girl group.
"2019: IT'z Different and IT'z ICY".
On February, ITZY released their debut single album, "IT'z Different," and the music video for its lead single "DALLA DALLA".
On July, ITZY released an EP, "IT'z ICY," along with the music video for its lead single "ICY".
"2020: It'z ME and Not Shy".
On March, ITZY released their EP, "IT'z ME", and the music video for its lead single "WANNABE". On August, ITZY released their EP, "Not Shy," as well as the music video for the lead single "Not Shy".
Awards.
ITZY received their first music show win on "M Countdown" and have achieved several Best New Female Artist awards, including the 2019 Melon Music Awards and the 2019 Mnet Asian Music Awards.
